entries.title: 9 ways Apple Watch can simplify your life
entries.description: Your Apple Watch is much more than a mini iPhone. Here's how to get the most out of that little computer on your wrist.

entries.title: Chick-fil-A revealed a troubling fix for a very big problem (not everyone is happy)
entries.description: This has been going on for a while, but in one US city. The chicken chain believes it's cracked it.

entries.title: Save $20 on the Dark Matter mic to level up your recordings
entries.description: Perfect for gaming, podcasts, and more, this microphone saw a $20 discount today. Shop it now.

entries.title: Hate self-checkout? Get ready for a change you never expected
entries.description: You didn't think this day would come? Oh, but this day always comes in the end.

entries.title: Gen Z embraces dumb flip phones, a smarter life hack than you'd think
entries.description: Are flip phones really a relic of the past or a future tool to protect mental health? For Gen Z, it's currently a content-coping device.
